Activity: Log in, check emails and bug tracking system for new bug reports or updates from the development team. Prioritize testing based on bug fixes.
Continue executing test cases from the 'Levels' section of the test plan. Focus on level flow, collision detection, and objective completion.
Document any bugs or issues encountered in the bug tracking system. Provide detailed steps to reproduce the issue, expected results, and actual results.
Begin executing test cases from the 'Character Interactions' section of the test plan. Test player-NPC, player-enemy, and enemy-enemy interactions.
Document any bugs or issues encountered in the bug tracking system. Prioritize issues based on severity and impact on gameplay.
Conduct performance testing, monitoring FPS, memory usage, and load times. Identify any performance bottlenecks.
Document any performance issues encountered in the bug tracking system. Provide detailed information about the hardware and software configuration used for testing.
Conduct stability testing, running long play sessions and performing repetitive actions. Monitor for crashes, freezes, and errors.
Compile a detailed report summarizing all testing activities performed during the week. Include a list of all identified bugs and issues, their severity, and their impact on gameplay.

Share the testing report with the development team, highlighting key findings and prioritizing issues based on severity. Distribute this report to @LDES-1, @LPRO-1, @PROD-1, and @BENG-1. Subject: Weekly Testing Report.
Finalize all documentation and prepare for the weekend.
